concept.title: Classifications Importer (Upload)
concept.shortdesc: Use the importer to upload classifications into reporting and analytics. You can also export the data for updating prior to an import.

conbody.p: The data that you import using the import tool must be in a specific format. Adobe provides you with the option to download a data template with all the proper header details in a tab-delimited data file. You can add your new data to this template and then import the data file in the browser, using FTP.
conbody.note: Adobe recommends that you limit the number of import and export columns to 30.
